Package TradingPlatform

Class Trade

java.lang.Object
TradingPlatform.Trade
public class Trade
extends java.lang.Object
Creates a new instance of either a BUY or SELL order for a trade

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Trade​(boolean type, AssetType asset, int quantity, int price, int organisationId)
    Creates a new trade instance

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addTradeOrder​(int orgAssetId, int quantity, boolean type, int price)
    Adds a new Trade Order to the database for the values given
    static int getOrganisationAssetId​(int tradeId)
    Gets the organisation asset ID for a given trade, returns -1 on error
    static java.lang.Boolean setCancel​(int tradeID)
    sets the trade to cancelled

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • Trade

      public Trade​(boolean type, AssetType asset, int quantity, int price, int organisationId)
      Creates a new trade instance
      Parameters:
      type - The trade type (true for buy, false for sell).
      asset - The trade asset.
      quantity - The quantity of the asset for the trade.
      price - The price of the asset for the trade.
      organisationId - The organisation initiating the trade order.

  • Method Details

    • addTradeOrder

      public void addTradeOrder​(int orgAssetId, int quantity, boolean type, int price)
      Adds a new Trade Order to the database for the values given
      Parameters:
      orgAssetId - An int showing the organisation asset ID for the trade.
      quantity - An int showing the quantity of the asset for the trade.
      type - A boolean showing the trade type (true for buy, false for sell).
      price - An int showing the price of the asset for the trade.

    • setCancel

      public static java.lang.Boolean setCancel​(int tradeID)
      sets the trade to cancelled
      Parameters:
      tradeID - An int representing the current trade ID
      Returns:
      A Boolean response from the server

    • getOrganisationAssetId

      public static int getOrganisationAssetId​(int tradeId)
      Gets the organisation asset ID for a given trade, returns -1 on error
      Parameters:
      tradeId - An int representing the current trade ID
      Returns:
      An int representing the organisation asset ID
